StringTable.Label: Unit_Citizen_Dec
StringTable.String: Citizens are the default non-specialized beings that inhabit this planet.

StringTable.Label: Unit_Worker_Dec
StringTable.String: Workers provide [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] based on their Diligence. Their low expectations give them an [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] boost.

StringTable.Label: Unit_Angry_Dec
StringTable.String: Angry citizen. Increase approval by lowering taxes or building approval boosting planetary improvements.

StringTable.Label: Unit_Protester_Dec
StringTable.String: This citizen is on strike due to low approval. Increase approval by lowering taxes or building approval boosting planetary improvements.

StringTable.Label: Unit_Rebel_Dec
StringTable.String: This citizen is actively rebelling against your oppressive regime. Increase approval by lowering taxes or building approval boosting planetary improvements.

StringTable.Label: Unit_Prisoner_Dec
StringTable.String: Prisoners don't contribute to your planet. But they also don't affect your planet's [HS=HS_Military]Approval[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Unit_Consume_Dec
StringTable.String: Consume this citizen to spawn a new citizen and give an Approval boost to the colony.[BR][BR]You cannot consume members of your own species, [HS=HS_Synthetic]Synthetic[/HS] or [HS=HS_Silicon]Silicon based[/HS] citizens.

StringTable.Label: Unit_Colonist_Dec
StringTable.String: Colonists serve the core worlds by gathering resources on distant colonies.

StringTable.Label: Unit_Scientist_Dec
StringTable.String: Scientists provide [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] based on their Intelligence. They also boost the experience gained by survey ships they crew.

StringTable.Label: Unit_Entrepreneur_Dec
StringTable.String: Entrepreneurs provide boost a world's [HS=HS_ColonyGrossIncome]Income[/HS] based on their Social trait.

StringTable.Label: Unit_Entrepreneur2_Dec
StringTable.String: Economists provide [HS=HS_TradeLicensesMax]Trade Licenses[/HS] as well as boost a world's [HS=HS_ColonyGrossIncome]Income[/HS] based on their Social and [HS=Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] based on their Diligence.

StringTable.Label: Unit_Farmer_Dec
StringTable.String: Farmers boost the world's [HS=HS_Food]Food[/HS] based on their Diligence. Use them on worlds with high [HS=HS_NaturalResources]Farming[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Unit_Farmer2_Dec
StringTable.String: Bioagriculturalists boost the world's [HS=HS_Food]Food[/HS] and lower its [HS=HS_Pollution]Pollution[/HS] based on their Diligence.

StringTable.Label: Unit_Entertainer_Dec
StringTable.String: Entertainers boost the worlds [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] based on their Social.

StringTable.Label: Unit_Celebrity_Dec
StringTable.String: Celebritys boost the worlds [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] based on their Social and [HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS] based on their Diligence.

StringTable.Label: Unit_Soldier_Dec
StringTable.String: Soldiers increase a planet's [HS=HS_Resistance]Resistance[/HS] and [HS=HS_Soldiering]Soldiering[/HS] based on their Resolve stat.

StringTable.Label: Unit_Cleric_Dec
StringTable.String: Divine Empaths raise the [HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS] based on their Diligence, [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] based on their Social and [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] based on their Intelligence.

StringTable.Label: Unit_Unassigned_Leader_Dec
StringTable.String: Leaders can be assigned as Governors, Ministers or Diplomats.

StringTable.Label: Unit_Leader_Dec
StringTable.String: Ministers can be assigned to ministry positions. The benefit they grant will depend on their Intelligence, Social and Diligence.

StringTable.Label: Unit_Governor_Dec
StringTable.String: Governors can be assigned to planets to promote them from Colonies to Core Worlds.[BR][BR]They provide their world the following bonuses:[BR][ICON=LeaderStat_Intelligence_Icon] [HS=HS_Intelligence]Intelligence[/HS] boosts [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS][BR][ICON=LeaderStat_Social_Icon] [HS=HS_Social]Social[/HS] boosts [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS][BR][ICON=LeaderStat_Diligence_Icon] [HS=HS_Diligence]Diligence[/HS] boosts [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Unit_Diplomat_Dec
StringTable.String: Diplomats are assigned to another civilization. They generate [HS=HS_DiplomaticCapital]Diplomatic Capital[/HS] every [HS=HS_Week]Month[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Unit_Commander_Dec
StringTable.String: Commanders are assigned to captain command ships.[BR][BR]They provide their ship the following bonuses:[BR][ICON=LeaderStat_Diligence_Icon][HS=HS_Diligence]Diligence[/HS] boosts [HS=HS_HitPoints]Hit Points[/HS][BR][ICON=LeaderStat_Resolve_Icon] [HS=HS_Resolve]Resolve[/HS] boosts Attack
